EPG search function to achieve,please look!

Example《舌尖上的中国》，Input “SJSDZG” and searching.
Do you want to delete this blog？
You can go online to watch

Social TV is digital TV a subfolder of the source feature, associate can show the current broadcast of live and on-demand programs corresponding to the associated Sina highlights social comment. You are now using the social TV for V3.0.
In digital TV source, the click of the remote control "right button" enter the social TV application, specific features are described as follows:

"Television broadcasting" area shows 24-hour broadcasting of the show the station name, program name, program screenshots, as well as broadcasting time periods. If there are no other TV service on the same show, then "other television stations in broadcasting" area displays all the local TV station name, programme title and play time of the programs.

"You watch the Internet" area shows locally-installed network video application with the current program has an associated video. If either the current network connection did not search in local network video applications to the associated program, this area is blank. From "television broadcasting" regional expansion. Note: search for fuzzy searches, the search result contains a word or words in a current program of all the shows.

"Television broadcasting" area you can choose specific programmes broadcast, if it is a program that is playing to jump directly to the appropriate television station to broadcast, if you have not yet played, you can choose to enter the channel or program for an appointment. Program to make an appointment, the show status changes to reservation status, 5 minutes before the program began broadcasting a pop-up alert box for users to cut, if the balloon pops up to 8 seconds without any operation, automatically switching to booking channel; had an appointment to show the same operation can be canceled in advance.

On SINA weibo authorization interface, enter the correct user name and password, click Authorize button, watch watch display area to view and publish information. Support local video sends screenshots to see. In the app store--in the user management, you can unlock the Sina microblog account bound.

upgrade,do not remove the card or turn off the machine
